Potato Soup with Chorizo


Ingredients
1 9 ounce Mexican chorizo
1/3 cup onions
2 cloves garlic, pressed
3 cups chicken broth
1 cup potatoes
1/2 tablespoon chicken bouillon granules (
1/2 teaspoon cumin
1/2 teaspoon oregano
1/3 cup heavy cream
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Cooking Instructions

Combine chorizo and onions in a soup pot over medium heat
and cook until onions are soft and translucent and chorizo
is fully cooked, 7 to 8 minutes. Add garlic and cook until
garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute more. Add chicken broth,
potatoes, chicken granules, cumin, and oregano. Bring to a
boil and simmer until potatoes are fork tender, 6 to 10
minutes. Reduce heat and stir in heavy whipping cream.
Season with salt and pepper.
